There's an amani scholar, Madyar, who's trying to put an end to the mining. Something about disturbing the balance in the region.

Anyway, the fool set off alone for the Azurice Shrine. Naturally, we've not heard from him since.

I wouldn't care, but he's got guts and that counts for a lot. Think you could find him?
Mmm...definitely a palpable shift in polaric energies around here. Definitely palpable. Oh, ho! Who are you?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I've been looking for you."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Bah, I'm not in danger. I was ambushed earlier but Uchamba and Krrevaas saved my life!

Come to think of it, you made it out here without an army to back you up. You might be just who we need. There's a chance to make peace with the wendigos, but we need your help.

Talk to Uchamba and hear his tale.

Me Uchamba, this Krrevaas.

We save Madyar, but Kaijas stronger. Hurt me badly. Need magic stone, you call azure shard.

Search northeast area, find magic stone. Bring back.

Kuohoh! Thank you!

Feel much better now. Madyar tell truth. Federation not all evil.

Change coming to Frost Reach. Magic stones almost goneâ€”humans take too many. Wendigos need them to survive.

The magical loop, the shrine, can make enough for both if we share. No greedy. Share.
Must have blue magic stone. Madyar says you call them azure shards. Look at northeast end.
